1. C6 deficiency: This is the disease entity mentioned in the paragraph. It is a specific type of complement deficiency. The complement system is part of the immune system that helps protect the body against infections. C6 deficiency is a condition where the body lacks sufficient amounts of the C6 protein, which is a component of the complement system. This deficiency can make individuals more susceptible to certain infections, particularly Neisseria meningitidis and Neisseria gonorrhoeae.
